item.title: Descript Video Editor for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who is proficient in using the Descript video editing tool. Your main responsibility will be to edit and post videos on YouTube.

The thumbnails will be provided, so you will only need to focus on the editing process. This includes tasks such as trimming, cutting, adding transitions, and optimizing audio. Attention to detail and the ability to produce high-quality videos that align with our brand is essential.

Also being good at english is very important because sometimes the videos have a few takes so you're going to know which take is the best and which other ones should be deleted.

We are seeking someone who can work efficiently and meet deadlines. Experience with YouTube channel management and knowledge of video SEO is a plus but not needed.

Skills needed:

- Proficiency in using Descript video editing tool
- Video editing and post-production
- Attention to detail
- Strong knowledge of YouTube platform (a plus, not needed)
- Ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines
- Familiarity with video SEO

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 02:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Video Editor to join our team and help create engaging and professional YouTube videos.

You need to be able to edit like this or BETTER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cgUogWggkDQ

As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding B Roll footage, transitions, Text templates, animations, and soud effects to create high-quality videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their editing skills and a good understanding of YouTube content.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit raw footage and assemble videos according project briefs & examples
  - Add sound effects, transitions, and graphics to enhance video quality
  - Ensure videos adhere to brand guidelines and YouTube best practices
  - Be a good communicator on Whatsapp.
  - Use Premiere Pro
  - Meet deadlines.

  Requirements:
  - Share with me links to 3 of your top edited Youtube videos.

Pay is 80$ per video and it will increase 10% every month until it reaches 150$.

Start your cover letter with your favorite color to show that you've read the entire job post.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video

item.title: Video Editor For Online Education Course - Upwork
item.description:
We're working on a Master-class style online course. The end project will be approximately 30 ten-minute video lectures shot using two cameras, one from the front and one from the side.

We need a video editor who, after each completed shoot, can

1) order and assemble the raw footage/multiple clips and
2) edit them down into one continuous clip that alternates between cameras A and B.

It's important that you can carefully consider pacing and the rationale for using a given camera angle/zoom in/zoom out. We'll provide you with the script for each shoot.

We're looking for an expert who can make editing choices that add value to the project and who does not require excessive hand-holding.

If you look at our reviews, you'll see we're easy to work with and provide clear communication.  We never, ever expect you to read our minds :-)


Hourly Range: $22.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
I am in need of someone who can get me honest non biased video testimonials for a product from alot of people. Must adhere to all YouTube guidelines. Demand is heavy and a flat rate is preferred. This is a financial product that can be evaluated through a website. You will not have to upload the videos to your own channel. I just need them created. All videos must be over ten minutes long. Full product explanation will be provided. Looking for English speakers at first, then will go fully worldwide. If you are someone who can aggregate many people to review the product, that would be excellent to have one single point of contact.

item.title: Podcast Editor and Social Media Uploader - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual who can handle all aspects of podcast editing and uploading, as well as managing the social media presence for our podcasts. The responsibilities include minor editing and uploading podcasts, adding meta data and descriptions, and ensuring the content is optimized for maximum reach. Additionally, you will be responsible for editing podcast videos and uploading them to various social media platforms 7 days a week. The ideal candidate should have experience in podcast editing software and be proficient in managing social media platforms. Strong attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are a must. We are looking for someone we can work with long-term who will be excited to work with our brand, we host a live radio show weekly which is building some traction and this person will potentially even be asked to do more VA tasks down the track.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00

Category: Audio Editing

item.title: Video Editor for High-Quality Long Form TikTok Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and meticulous video editor to join our team and handle the editing of our IG / TikTok series. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail and the ability to transform raw footage into concise, engaging videos that capture our audience's attention. If you have experience with iMovie and a knack for creating tight, snappy edits that follow a clear narrative, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:
•Edit raw footage (18-35 minutes) into a concise and engaging 1.5-minute video.
•Perform clean cuts with no fancy transitions, ensuring a seamless flow from one word to the next.
•Edit audio to the last vowel, word, and letter for a polished and tight final product.
•Ensure the video follows a clear narrative and makes sense from start to finish as we tour the home.
•Maintain high-quality visual and audio standards consistent with our brand.
•Collaborate on revisions and feedback to achieve the desired final product.

Requirements:
•Proven experience in video editing, specifically with iMovie.
•Strong storytelling skills and attention to detail.
•Ability to create tight, concise edits that are snappy and engaging.
•Familiarity with TikTok trends and formats.
•Excellent communication skills and ability to work with tight deadlines.
•A portfolio showcasing previous work, especially short-form content.

Preferred Skills (Optional but Beneficial):
•Tik Tik Video editing
•IG Reels video editing
•UGC video editing
•Influencer editing
•Long-form editing

Compensation:
•Competitive, based on experience.

To apply, please submit the following:
•Your resume.
•A portfolio of your previous work, particularly TikTok or similar short-form videos.
•A brief cover letter explaining why you're a good fit for this role.

About Us:
•We are a dynamic and creative team focused on producing high-quality, engaging content for our growing TikTok audience. Our videos explore interesting living spaces and rent costs in various locations, providing viewers with unique insights and entertaining tours.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:36 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:TikTok Video, MOV, Footage-Based Video, Video Editing, UGC, Instagram Reels, Apple iMovie, CapCut
Skills: TikTok Video, MOV, Footage-Based Video, Video Editing, UGC, Instagram Reels, Apple iMovie, CapCut
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Video Editor & Graphic Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are currently seeking an experienced freelance video editor and graphic designer.

We are a B2B XR production company based in Sydney, Australia who have worked on over 300 super exciting XR projects in 8 countries.

We currently have an amazing team of video designers and producers creating our XR projects, but are seeking someone who is social media savvy and has experience in creating Instagram/LinkedIn content which will be able to reflect our brand personality. This person will likely be needed to create content for us once a week, whether that be in the form of videos or stills.

This role will require high-quality video editing alongside the creation of still graphics for Instagram/LinkedIn carousels. We are seeking someone with good initiative and a creative flair to make our content engaging and eye-catching whilst remaining highly professional.

If this sounds like something you are interested or experienced in, and would like to help us out, please respond to this ad.

Many thanks,
Amy Brown
Digital Marketing and Social Media Executive


Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Instagram Reels, Dynamic Transition, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Audio Editing, Graphic Design, Instagram Post, Photo Editing

Country: Australia

item.title: Video Editor for Racing Game Highlights - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to join our team and create dynamic highlight clips from our Unity-based racing game. Your main task will be to capture exciting moments from our races and compile them into engaging highlight videos, similar to Formula 1 race highlights.

Responsibilities:
Capture video footage from our Unity-based racing game.
Edit and compile footage into highlight clips, showcasing the most thrilling moments of the race.
Add transitions, effects, and music to enhance the viewer experience.
Ensure videos are polished, professional, and align with our brand’s style.

Requirements:
Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Familiarity with Unity and video capture within gaming environments.
Strong understanding of racing or sports highlight editing.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 01:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
